import { useContext, useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { ScriptsContext } from "../../context/ScriptsContext"; import { ApiContext } from "../../context/ApiContext"; const InboxModal = () => { const {inboxMessageID} = useContext(ScriptsContext) const {getInboxFocusedMessage} = useContext(ApiContext) const [message, setMessage] = useState({}) const sendMessage = useRef() //e const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(sendMessage.current) } // const getMessage = async()=> {setMessage(await getInboxFocusedMessage(inboxMessageID))} useEffect(()=> {getMessage()}, []) return (

{message ? message.name : "Name"}

{message ? message.date : "Date"}

{message ? message.title : "Title"}

{message ? message.description : "Description"}

) } export default InboxModal;
